articles.content: The Washington Football Team looks to get back to their winning ways on Thursday night, as they play host to the NFC East rival New York Giants. Both teams lost their season openers on Sunday, but a … [+1062 chars]

articles.author: Charles Keeshan
articles.title: 'Sad to see that close': Sears soon will end its 50-year run at Woodfield - Chicago Daily Herald
articles.description: The Sears store at Woodfield Mall in Schaumburg, the iconic retailer's final location in Illinois, will close its doors in November as part of a corporate plan to "redevelop and reinvigorate the property," officials announced.
articles.content: The Sears anchor store at Woodfield Mall was such an instrumental part of the shopping center's creation and early success that part of the mall's name -- the "Wood" is for legendary former Sears Cha… [+3469 chars]

articles.title: Thousands of Migrants Huddle in Squalid Conditions Under Texas Bridge - The New York Times
articles.description: The temporary camp in Del Rio has grown with staggering speed in recent days during a massive surge in migration that has overwhelmed the authorities.
